title: PCP-lite Context Packet Manifest
description: Schema for machine-readable Context Packets used by Clarity Engine (Stage 0).

project.description: Optional project name the packet belongs to.

substage.description: Optional substage identifier within the lifecycle stage.

version.description: Optional version of the PCP-lite schema/template used to craft the packet.

mission.description: Succinct mission statement for the packet.

current_reality.description: Bullet list of current, factual statements.

constraints.description: Boundary conditions that must hold true.

required_artifacts.description: Outputs that must be produced for the packet to be complete.

failure_modes.description: Known risks, anti-goals, or explicit non-scope items.

substage_gate.description: Boundaries describing what is in or out of scope for the substage.

sources_of_truth.description: Optional links or references that anchor facts and constraints.
